mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER ( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_DESC, ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE, ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS, ORDER_CONTACT_NAME, ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE, ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT, ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID, ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE, ORDER_COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderDesc}, #{orderDeliveryDate}, #{orderDeliveryAddress}, #{orderContactName}, #{orderContactPhone}, #{orderTotalEstimation}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderEffectiveBeginDate}, #{orderEffectiveEndDate}, #{orderBidRecordLimit}, #{orderFinalBidUid}, #{orderFinalBidPrice}, #{orderComment}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER SET ORDER_DESC = #{orderDesc}, ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE = #{orderDeliveryDate}, ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS = #{orderDeliveryAddress}, ORDER_CONTACT_NAME = #{orderContactName}, ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE = #{orderContactPhone}, ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION = #{orderTotalEstimation}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus}, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE = #{orderEffectiveBeginDate}, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE = #{orderEffectiveEndDate}, ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT = #{orderBidRecordLimit}, ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID = #{orderFinalBidUid}, ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE = #{orderFinalBidPrice}, ORDER_COMMENT = #{orderComment}, CREATE_AUTHOR = #{createAuthor}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime}, UPDATE_AUTHOR = #{updateAuthor}, UPDATE_DATETIME = current_timestamp() WHERE UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime} AND ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} AND UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_DESC AS "orderDesc", ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE AS "orderDeliveryDate", ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS AS "orderDeliveryAddress", ORDER_CONTACT_NAME AS "orderContactName", ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE AS "orderContactPhone", ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION AS "orderTotalEstimation", ORDER_STATUS AS "orderStatus", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE AS "orderEffectiveBeginDate", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE AS "orderEffectiveEndDate", ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT AS "orderBidRecordLimit", ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID AS "orderFinalBidUid", ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE AS "orderFinalBidPrice", ORDER_COMMENT AS "orderComment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode}

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_DESC AS "orderDesc", ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE AS "orderDeliveryDate", ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS AS "orderDeliveryAddress", ORDER_CONTACT_NAME AS "orderContactName", ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE AS "orderContactPhone", ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION AS "orderTotalEstimation", ORDER_STATUS AS "orderStatus", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE AS "orderEffectiveBeginDate", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE AS "orderEffectiveEndDate", ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT AS "orderBidRecordLimit", ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID AS "orderFinalBidUid", ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE AS "orderFinalBidPrice", ORDER_COMMENT AS "orderComment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER WHERE ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_DESC AS "orderDesc", ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE AS "orderDeliveryDate", ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS AS "orderDeliveryAddress", ORDER_CONTACT_NAME AS "orderContactName", ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE AS "orderContactPhone", ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION AS "orderTotalEstimation", ORDER_STATUS AS "orderStatus", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE AS "orderEffectiveBeginDate", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE AS "orderEffectiveEndDate", ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT AS "orderBidRecordLimit", ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID AS "orderFinalBidUid", ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE AS "orderFinalBidPrice", ORDER_COMMENT AS "orderComment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORDER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderCode}, '%') AND ORDER_DESC LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderDesc}, '%') AND ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderDeliveryDate}, '%') AND ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderDeliveryAddress}, '%') AND ORDER_CONTACT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderContactName}, '%') AND ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderContactPhone}, '%') AND ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderTotalEstimation}, '%') AND ORDER_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderStatus}, '%') AND ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderEffectiveBeginDate}, '%') AND ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderEffectiveEndDate}, '%') AND ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderBidRecordLimit}, '%') AND ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderFinalBidUid}, '%') AND ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderFinalBidPrice}, '%') AND ORDER_COMMENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orderComment}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT ORDER_CODE AS "orderCode", ORDER_DESC AS "orderDesc", ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE AS "orderDeliveryDate", ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS AS "orderDeliveryAddress", ORDER_CONTACT_NAME AS "orderContactName", ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE AS "orderContactPhone", ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION AS "orderTotalEstimation", ORDER_STATUS AS "orderStatus", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE AS "orderEffectiveBeginDate", ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE AS "orderEffectiveEndDate", ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT AS "orderBidRecordLimit", ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID AS "orderFinalBidUid", ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE AS "orderFinalBidPrice", ORDER_COMMENT AS "orderComment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM ORDER WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${orderCode} ) AND ( ${orderDesc} ) AND ( ${orderDeliveryDate} ) AND ( ${orderDeliveryAddress} ) AND ( ${orderContactName} ) AND ( ${orderContactPhone} ) AND ( ${orderTotalEstimation} ) AND ( ${orderStatus} ) AND ( ${orderEffectiveBeginDate} ) AND ( ${orderEffectiveEndDate} ) AND ( ${orderBidRecordLimit} ) AND ( ${orderFinalBidUid} ) AND ( ${orderFinalBidPrice} ) AND ( ${orderComment} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_HT ( OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY, ORDER_CODE, ORDER_DESC, ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE, ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS, ORDER_CONTACT_NAME, ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE, ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT, ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID, ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE, ORDER_COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( current_timestamp(), 'C', #{orderCode}, #{orderDesc}, #{orderDeliveryDate}, #{orderDeliveryAddress}, #{orderContactName}, #{orderContactPhone}, #{orderTotalEstimation}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderEffectiveBeginDate}, #{orderEffectiveEndDate}, #{orderBidRecordLimit}, #{orderFinalBidUid}, #{orderFinalBidPrice}, #{orderComment}, #{createAuthor}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateAuthor}, #{updateDatetime} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_HT ( OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY, ORDER_CODE, ORDER_DESC, ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE, ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS, ORDER_CONTACT_NAME, ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE, ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT, ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID, ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE, ORDER_COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( current_timestamp(), 'U', #{orderCode}, #{orderDesc}, #{orderDeliveryDate}, #{orderDeliveryAddress}, #{orderContactName}, #{orderContactPhone}, #{orderTotalEstimation}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderEffectiveBeginDate}, #{orderEffectiveEndDate}, #{orderBidRecordLimit}, #{orderFinalBidUid}, #{orderFinalBidPrice}, #{orderComment}, #{createAuthor}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateAuthor}, #{updateDatetime} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_HT ( OPERATION_HISTORY_DATETIME, OPERATION_HISTORY_CATEGORY, ORDER_CODE, ORDER_DESC, ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE, ORDER_DELIVERY_ADDRESS, ORDER_CONTACT_NAME, ORDER_CONTACT_PHONE, ORDER_TOTAL_ESTIMATION, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_BEGIN_DATE, ORDER_EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, ORDER_BID_RECORD_LIMIT, ORDER_FINAL_BID_UID, ORDER_FINAL_BID_PRICE, ORDER_COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( current_timestamp(), 'D', #{orderCode}, #{orderDesc}, #{orderDeliveryDate}, #{orderDeliveryAddress}, #{orderContactName}, #{orderContactPhone}, #{orderTotalEstimation}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderEffectiveBeginDate}, #{orderEffectiveEndDate}, #{orderBidRecordLimit}, #{orderFinalBidUid}, #{orderFinalBidPrice}, #{orderComment}, #{createAuthor}, #{createDatetime}, #{updateAuthor}, #{updateDatetime} )
